alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 26 at 1:34PM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...The eastern Magic Valley and the southern hills and Albion Mountains. This includes the cities and towns of Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley, Albion, and Almo. This advisory also affects the City of Rocks National Reserve. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Unsecured objects may be blown around.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
